data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Rogaland, Norway.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rogaland, Norway
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Rogaland, Norway to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Rogaland to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Rogaland.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bosniak people might believe through him.
Spirit, encourage the church of Rogaland, Norway that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 38,429 believers in Rogaland against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rogaland, Norway has a population of 482,700.

We estimate Rogaland has 38,429 people who might know Jesus, 383,247 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 61,024 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Rogaland.

location.name: Rogaland
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Dutch, Thai, Persian, Somali
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Syrian (23,000), Dutch (5,500), Thai (21,000), Persian (21,000), Somali (39,000)
